snippet.title: ★Animated Short [Thus Spoke Apocalypse]★ Japanese-Dubbed - Honkai Impact 3rd
snippet.description:
Animated short [Thus Spoke Apocalypse] Japanese-Dubbed version released.
How many crimes must he commit
to save her from the depths of hell?
How far must he go
to find himself at the end of time?

This animated short is presented by miHoYo Anime. 

Subscribe our YouTube and turn on notification for latest video : http://bit.ly/HonkaiImpact3rdYTB 

Visit Honkai Impact 3rd Official Website:
https://honkaiimpact3.mihoyo.com/global/
